snippet: Residents of Henryville, Ind., filtered into church on Sunday, turning to their faith for solace two days after a tornado leveled the town’s center.

byline.original: By STEVEN YACCINO and CHANNING JOSEPH
byline.contributor: Steven Yaccino reported from Henryville, Ind., and Channing Joseph from New York.

lead_paragraph: Residents of Henryville, Ind., filtered into church on Sunday, turning to their faith for solace two days after a tornado leveled the town’s center.

headline.seo: Amid Tornado Cleanup, Worship in Indiana Town
headline.main: In Indiana, Prayer Amid the Storm Cleanup
